Song.title: Rock Of Ages, Cleft For Me (Kauflin)
Song.copyright: Words by Augustus Toplady Music & alt. words by Bob Kauflin © 1998 Sovereign Grace Praise
Song.amazon_links: [{"asin":"B001BOY3BG","title":"Rock of Ages, Cleft for Me","artist":"Sovereign Grace Music","image_url":"http:\/\/ecx.images-amazon.com\/images\/I\/51kpGaYi7nL._SL75_.jpg"}]

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: Rock of [C]Ages, [G]cleft for [C]me, let me [Em]hide my[F]self in [G]Thee Let the [Am]water [G]and the [F]blood, from Thy [Em]wounded side which [F]flowed Be of [Em]sin the double [F]cure, Save from [Dm9]wrath and [Gsus]make me [C]pure
Verse 2: All the [C]labors [Csus]of my [C]hands, could not [Em]meet Thy [F]law’s de[G]mands Could my [Am]zeal no [G]respite [F]know, could my [Em]tears forever [F]flow All for [Em]sin could not a[F]tone, Thou must [Dm9]save, and [Gsus]Thou a[Fmaj7/A | G7/B | Fmaj9/A | G7/B]lone
Verse 3: Nothing [Am]in my hand I [G/A]bring, simply [Dm/A]to the cross I [Am2]cling Naked [Dm]come to [G]Thee for [F]dress, helpless [Em]look to Thee for [F]grace To Thy [Em]fountain, Lord, I [F]fly Wash me [Dm9]Savior, [Gsus]or I [Ab (to bridge)]die
Bridge: [Ab | Bb/Ab | Ab | Bb/Ab | Cm2 | Gm6 | Fm7 | Bb2/D]
Verse 4: While I [C/G]draw this [G]fleeting [C/G]breath, When mine [Em/G]eyes shall [F/G]close in [G]death When I [Am]soar to [G]worlds un[F]known, See Thee [Cmaj7/G]on Thy judgment [Fmaj7/G]throne, Rock of [Cmaj7/G]Ages, cleft for [Fmaj7]me, Let me [Dm9]hide my[| Dm9 | Dm9 | Dm9]self In [C2]Thee
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 rock of ages cleft for me let me hide myself in thee let the water and the blood from thy wounded side which flowed be of sin the double cure save from wrath and make me pure verse 2 all the labors of my hands could not meet thy laws demands could my zeal no respite know could my tears forever flow all for sin could not atone thou must save and thou alone verse 3 nothing in my hand i bring simply to the cross i cling naked come to thee for dress helpless look to thee for grace to thy fountain lord i fly wash me savior or i die bridge verse 4 while i draw this fleeting breath when mine eyes shall close in death when i soar to worlds unknown see thee on thy judgment throne rock of ages cleft for me let me hide myself in thee
Arrangement.album: Upward: The Bob Kauflin Hymns Project

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: Rock of [C]Ages, [G]cleft for [C]me, let me [Em]hide my[F]self in [G]Thee Let the [Am]water [G]and the [F]blood, from Thy [Em]wounded side which [F]flowed Be of [Em]sin the double [F]cure, Save from [Dm9]wrath and [Gsus]make me [C | Csus | C | Csus]pure
Verse 2: All the [C]labors [G]of my [C]hands, could not [Em]meet Thy [F]law’s de[G]mands Could my [Am]zeal no [G]respite [F]know, could my [Em]tears forever [F]flow All for [Em]sin could not a[F]tone, Thou must [Dm9]save, and [Gsus]Thou a[Fmaj7/A | G7/B | Fmaj9/A | G7/B]lone
Verse 3: Nothing [C]in my [G]hand I [C]bring, simply [Em]to the [F]cross I [G]cling Naked [Am]come to [G]Thee for [F]dress, helpless [Em]look to Thee for [F]grace To Thy [Em]fountain, Lord, I [F]fly, Wash me [Dm9]Savior, [Gsus]or I [C | Csus | C | Gsus G]die
Verse 4: While I [C/G]draw this [G]fleeting [C/G]breath, When mine [Em]eyes shall [F/G]close in [G]death When I [Am]soar to [G]worlds un[F]known, See Thee [Em]on Thy judgment [F]throne, Rock of [Em]Ages, cleft for [F]me, Let me [Dm9]hide my[Gsus]self, in [C2]Thee
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 rock of ages cleft for me let me hide myself in thee let the water and the blood from thy wounded side which flowed be of sin the double cure save from wrath and make me pure verse 2 all the labors of my hands could not meet thy laws demands could my zeal no respite know could my tears forever flow all for sin could not atone thou must save and thou alone verse 3 nothing in my hand i bring simply to the cross i cling naked come to thee for dress helpless look to thee for grace to thy fountain lord i fly wash me savior or i die verse 4 while i draw this fleeting breath when mine eyes shall close in death when i soar to worlds unknown see thee on thy judgment throne rock of ages cleft for me let me hide myself in thee
Arrangement.album: Upward: The Bob Kauflin Hymns Project
